website_summaries.verdict: A natural leather tote with a functional minimalist design.
pros: The two-handled bag can be worn as a shoulder tote and features a large main compartment, as well as a small zippered pocket
It's lightweight and the leather is quite soft and feels high-quality
In addition, the bag is made in the USA
cons: The bag sheds leather fibers very easily and  lacks a lining

customer_reviews.title: Good, but minor annoyances
customer_reviews.text: A very good and simple bag. Fits all the essentials. I use it for a diaper/baby bag. Pieces of leather from the inside of the bag get stuck on everything. I agree that it should be lined to prevent this. Even though I put everything in ziplocks, the leather fibers still gets on everywhere. Even so, I like the bag.
customer_reviews.author: T. L.Top Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: ... smaller than I thought it would be but clearly good quality. I like the unfinished inside
customer_reviews.text: This bag is smaller than I thought it would be but clearly good quality. I like the unfinished inside. Fits my necessities for work including my giant water bottle, notebook, kindle, planner, and bags o' snacks. Pocket is nice for lipstick and other things I need to reach quickly.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Color fades fast
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this bag for five months and the color is already fading. Really disappointed that it started losing color at 4 months would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Christina T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality at Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: I had seen this bag in stores and I knew I was nice, soft leather and very light and comfortable to carry. I use it as a casual bag because it has no lining. Perfect for weekends. Amazon's price is at least $40.00 less than stores.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie H.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality and price . The bag is stylish and can hold a lot with out being too bulky. I actually use it as a purse/diaper bag
customer_reviews.author: veronica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: L❤️VE this bag! This is my second Baggu bag! My first was a swag bag gift from a fundraiser.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Fisher-Kemp

customer_reviews.title: The perfect size for carrying my iPad and a few folders ...
customer_reviews.text: The leather is so soft! The perfect size for carrying my iPad and a few folders to work, or to take as my basic bag on a plane while traveling. It's got a small zippered compartment for holding small essentials, which is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: The bag was dirty when I opened the package it was shipped in
customer_reviews.text: The bag was dirty when I opened the package it was shipped in. The bag color was black and there was white stuff on the straps. I removed it I think with a wet cloth. What came off was black on the cloth. It made me belive it was not an entirely new bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lolly Donovan

customer_reviews.title: I can fit a ton of stuff in this beautiful, supple leather bag
customer_reviews.text: I found my carry all essential bag! I can fit a ton of stuff in this beautiful, supple leather bag. I also love the clean and minimal design of the bag. Best purchase this year! Only one problem: I want it in brown, pink and maybe red now...
customer_reviews.author: moon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super soft leather - and sturdy. This is a classy bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Good, simple bag
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it sheds on the inside. Yes it has some color transfer. But, it's a beautiful, high quality bag that is light as a feather. I put my whole day in there (lunch bag, full coffee thermos, notebook, folders, makeup bag, wallet, extra sweater) and it feels like I'm carrying nothing. I don't have to worry about whether it matches my outfit or anything. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: The perfect tote!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I've had it since October of last year and with daily use it's held up really well. I got it one day when the price dipped really low. It has one small zipped pocket on the inside. This bag is unfinished leather on the inside so it does shed a little bit but you get used to it. It can fit a 13 in macbook inside. The leather is very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Narrow bag.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality leather but the bag is a little too narrow for my liking, and there is no closure. Unfortunately this bag is going back.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Lola
customer_reviews.text: The bag is super lite, soft and comfortable to wear, however the top opening trim is simply cut with a scissor and no trim / stitching provided. For a top quality bag , it diminishes the classy look and quality of the leather Tote bag. For the price and reputation of Baggu, i expected higher quality finish.
customer_reviews.author: Viva

customer_reviews.title: Love it. But, upgraded version may be better.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very simple, soft leather bag. It is not a big bag but, I can put tons of things! I love the fact it is made in USA. I visited BAGGU official site and they now sell upgraded version. (Folded top for more durability). I like that better but, I bought this one (older model) with discounted price from Amazon so that is ok. Anybody who is paying full price, you may want to check the upgraded version.
customer_reviews.author: eva1246

customer_reviews.title: love baggu!
customer_reviews.text: A great basic tote. Soft, buttery leather. Perfect size. It has a small pocket perfect for your phone or keys.
customer_reviews.author: frances Cibilich

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased almost 2months ago I was very happy because of nice and beautiful looks But inside is ...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased almost 2months ago I was very happy because of nice and beautiful looks But inside is very disappointed Swade material , it 's stained from swade material as black dust to all my belonging How am i to solve it? Washed and brushed off i've done Show me the solution
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I just lost $160 on a bad product. It is not big enough and is ...
customer_reviews.text: I just lost $160 on a bad product. It is not big enough and is like a black hole where everything gets lost :(
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey C. Knobloch

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite travel bags
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite travel bags! I use this as my personal item when traveling. Its enlarges to fit a lot of stuff, and is very light weight! It has held up tremendously well over the last several years. One thing to note, the inside pockets did come off, but I was able to easily sew it back into place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Black Baggu
customer_reviews.text: As promised, my Baggu came within 2 days with Amazon prime and was 2/3 the price I had seen in store (win!). I had been contemplating whether to get this bag for while as my sister loved her H&M bag that looked very similar, but I am so glad that I went ahead and got this one. The real leather is soft and supple, making it easy to store if not in use and less likely to smack someone as you're passing by.
customer_reviews.author: Ansen

product_meta.title: BAGGU Leather Basic Tote
product_meta.description:
An all day, every day, every night carry all. Our simple tote in the softest leather. Now with folded over top edge for added finish and durability. Two handles with 10.5" drop comfortably fit over the shoulder. Interior zipper pocket. Made in the USA.
